#rstats tip that just blew my mind: want to subset a dataframe using $ at the end of a pipe for another operation?

best_median <- bootsamp %>%
          filter(...) %>% 
          "$"(var_i_want_median_of) %>% 
          median()

I used to write this in two steps!

I have come to the end of my curation. I hope you enjoyed hearing from me about #rstats, teaching stats + probability, art, and languages, got to meet new #RLadies, and learn about their projects. Feel free to keep in touch @MineDogucu
